summary: You can run Vim over ssh on Vim!
name: vimshell-ssh
description:
A vimshell plugin that enables you to use "vim" command over ssh on vimshell.

See the detail below.
https://github.com/ujihisa/vimshell-ssh
install_details: After you install Shougo's vimshell and its dependencies, unarchive the tgz file into a directory that is under &rtp of your Vim, including ~/.vim dir.
